message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I take $60, you take $40. We both walk away happy.
I think we can both do better than that. I'm willing to give you 45, which is closer to what you asked for, but I want to be sure I get a good deal too.
Bob, my turn.  I'm feeling the inflation pinch, so this has to be quicker. I'll take $55, you get $45.  It's more than you offered last round!
